## [Pckages for Exploratory Data Analysis](https://journal.r-project.org/archive/2019/RJ-2019-033/RJ-2019-033.pdf)ðŸ’¯

**What is this?**

This is a list of all the packages mentioned in the "The Landscape of R Packages for Automated Exploratory Data Analysis" article by Mateusz Staniak & PrzemysÅ‚aw Biecek.
Check the paper out!

1.  The arsenal package (Heinzen et al., 2019): <https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/arsenal/arsenal.pdf>
2.  The autoEDA package (Horn, 2018a): <https://github.com/XanderHorn/autoEDA>
3.  The DataExplorer (Cui, 2019): <https://cran.r-project.org/package=DataExplorer>
4.  The dataMaid (Petersen and Ekstrom, 2018): [https://cran.r-project.org/package=dataMaid](https://cran.r-project.org/package=dataMaidThe%20dlookr%20(Ryu,%202019)%20package:%20https://cran.r-project.org/package=dlookr)
5.  [The dlookr (Ryu, 2019) package: https://cran.r-project.org/package=dlookr](https://cran.r-project.org/package=dataMaidThe%20dlookr%20(Ryu,%202019)%20package:%20https://cran.r-project.org/package=dlookr)
6.  The ExPanDaR package (Gassen, 2018): <https://github.com/joachim-gassen/ExPanDaR>
7.  The explore package (Krasser, 2019): <https://cran.r-project.org/package=explore>
8.  The exploreR package (Coates, 2016): <https://cran.r-project.org/package=exploreR>
9.  The package funModeling (Casas, 2019): <https://cran.r-project.org/package=funModeling>
10. The inspectdf package (Rushworth, 2019): <https://cran.r-project.org/package=inspectdf>
11. The RtutoR package (Nair, 2018a): <https://cran.r-project.org/package=RtutoR>
12. The SmartEDA package (Ubrangala et al., 2018): <https://cran.r-project.org/package=SmartEDA>
13. The summarytools package (Comtois, 2019): <https://cran.r-project.org/package=summarytools>
14. The package visdat (Tierney, 2017): [https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/visdat/index.html](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/visdat/index.htmlThe%20xray%20(Seibelt,%202017)%20package:%20https://cran.r-project.org/package=xray)
15. [The xray (Seibelt, 2017) package: https://cran.r-project.org/package=xray](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/visdat/index.htmlThe%20xray%20(Seibelt,%202017)%20package:%20https://cran.r-project.org/package=xray)
16. The package tableone (Yoshida and Bohn., 2018): <https://cran.r-project.org/package=tableone>
17. The describe function from describer package (Hendricks, 2015): <https://cran.r-project.org/package=describer>
18. The skimr (Quinn et al., 2019) package: <https://cran.r-project.org/package=skimr>
19. The prettyR (Lemon and Grosjean, 2018) package: <https://cran.r-project.org/package=prettyR>
20. The package Hmisc (Harrell Jr et al., 2019) Describe function: <https://cran.r-project.org/package=Hmisc>
